title: Ink, inc.
description: Lukas once did something terrible. Ever since, he's been taking Care - a drug which gives him a conscience. When Lukas gets kidnapped, his supply is cut off. He's Carefree. Who is his captor? And what will she do when he becomes a monster? Ink, Inc. is a gripping thriller from the award-winning author of Money Run.
author: Jack Heath
